## ğŸ“‹ How to Use

Add commands below in natural language. The system will automatically parse and execute them.

**Format:**
```markdown
- [ ] **Command:** [Your natural language instruction]
  - **Status:** Pending
  - **Added:** YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM
```

## ğŸ“ Command Examples

**Work through a phase:**
- Work through Phase 2.5
- Complete all tasks in Phase 2.5
- Execute Phase 2.5

**Work until a task:**
- Work until BUG-007 is complete
- Complete all tasks up to BUG-007
- Execute until WF-004

**Execute specific tasks:**
- Run BUG-002, BUG-003, and BUG-007
- Execute BUG-002 and BUG-003
- Start agents for BUG-004 and BUG-005

**Auto-select:**
- Execute recommended tasks
- Run auto-selected tasks
- Start swarm with auto mode

---

**Note:** Commands are processed automatically. Add your command above and it will be executed.
